activities: Adzerk is an ad serving platform that our customers use to manage their ad delivery.  We may collect anonymous usage information that does not identify an individual User ("Non-Personal Information") when Publishers, Advertisers, and Ad Networks use Adzerk's ad serving platform. Adzerk uses its cookies to serve relevant and targeted advertisements. A visitor receives a cookie from Adzerk when they visit a website where one of our Publishers, Advertisers, and/or Ad Networks has an ad call. We encode our cookies so that only we can interpret the information stored in them. Users are free to decline our cookies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Adzerk does not collect personally identifiable information. Our customers may optionally store personally identifiable information within Adzerk, but that data is accessible only by our customers and is never aggregated.
recoursemech: If parties are unable to resolve their concern or dispute with us, they may submit complaints to JAMS for mediation pursuant to the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
